{{Set index}}

'''Physics''' may refer to:
* Kinematics &ndash; the movement of [[entities]] (falling blocks, moving [[vehicles]], and projectiles, including mobs launched into the [[sky]]).
* Fluid dynamics &ndash; the flow of [[fluids]] ([[lava]] and [[water]]), which can wash out or burn blocks.
* Electricity &ndash; the signal of [[redstone]], an "electrical" signal which travels through wires and powers certain objects.
* Sound &ndash; the mechanic of [[vibration]] in ''Minecraft'', which is a type of "sound wave" that propagates through a medium, such as blocks or entities.
